titles.title: RS279 I Will Sing, I Will Sing

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will sing, I will sing a song unto the Lord, (3 times)
Alleluia, glory to the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We will come, we will come as one before the Lord, (3 times)
Alleluia, glory to the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If the Son, if the Son shall make you free, (3 times)
You shall be free indeed.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
They that sow in tears shall reap in joy, (3 times)
Alleluia, glory to the Lord!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Every knee shall bow and every tongue confess, (3 times)
That Jesus Christ is Lord.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
In His name, in His name we have the victory, (3 times)
Alleluia, glory to the Lord.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Allelu, alleluia, glory to the Lord,
Allelu, alleluia, glory to the Lord,
Allelu, alleluia, glory to the Lord,
Alleluia, glory to the Lord.
